text.div:
FHIR_SPL

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7.org/fhir/us/spl/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.us.spl

A guide that provides mapping from the FDA SPL Documents to FHIR Resources and operations.

name: FHIR_SPL
title: SPL Mapping FHIR Implementation Guide
description: A guide that provides mapping from the FDA SPL Documents to FHIR Resources and operations.

grouping.name: Logical Models
grouping.description: Logical models that show the data elements for each use case

grouping.name: Operation Bundles
grouping.description: Bundle profiles that are used in the various use case operations

grouping.name: Operation Message
grouping.description: MessageHeader profiles that are used in the various use case operations

grouping.name: FDA Labeler Organizations
grouping.description: Artifacts associated with the Labeler Organization use cases

grouping.name: FDA Establishment Organizations
grouping.description: Artifacts associated with the Estabishment Organization use cases

grouping.name: GDUFA Facility Identification
grouping.description: Artifacts associated with the GDUFA Facility Identification use cases

grouping.name: General Organization Structures
grouping.description: Artifacts that are used in any of the Organization use cases

grouping.name: Product Submission Document
grouping.description: Artifacts associated with the submission of a product document

grouping.name: Dual Submission Tracking
grouping.description: Artifacts needed for tracking dual submissions of SPL documents and FHIR Bundles

resource.name: DualSubmissionProvenance
resource.description: A profile that links changes made to a FHIR system either via a converted SPL document or that are sent to a SPL system

resource.name: EstablishmentAffiliation
resource.description: A profile that associates an registrant to the establishments it is registering.

resource.name: EstablishmentBusinessOperation
resource.description: A profile that associates an establishment to the set of business operations that it can perform.

resource.name: EstablishmentInactivationBundle
resource.description: A profile that represents the Bundle that contains all of the resources for an Estabishment Inactivation Request.

resource.name: EstablishmentInactivationMessage
resource.description: A profile of an Establishment Inactivation message

resource.name: EstablishmentOrganization
resource.description: A profile for the data elements required to identify an organization that is registered as an Establishment.

resource.name: EstablishmentRegistrantOrganization
resource.description: A specialization of the RegistrantOrganization profile that fixes the type to EstablishmentRegistrant

resource.name: EstablishmentRegistrationBundle
resource.description: A profile that represents the Bundle that contains all of the resources for an Estabishment Registration Request.

resource.name: EstablishmentRegistrationMessage
resource.description: A profile of an Establishment Registration message

resource.name: GDUFAFacilityAffiliation
resource.description: A profile that associates a GDUFA facility to its registrant.

resource.name: GDUFAFacilityBusinessOperation
resource.description: A profile that associates an establishment to the set of business operations that it can perform.

resource.name: GDUFAFacilityIdentificationBundle
resource.description: A profile that represents the Bundle that contains all of the resources for a GDUFA Facility Identification Request.

resource.name: GDUFAFacilityIdentificationMessage
resource.description: A profile of a GDUFA Facility Identification message

resource.name: GDUFAFacilityInactivationBundle
resource.description: A profile that represents the Bundle that contains all of the resources for an GDUFA Facility Inactivation Request.

resource.name: GDUFAFacilityInactivationMessage
resource.description: A profile of an GDUFA Facility Inactivation message

resource.name: GDUFAFacilityOrganization
resource.description: A profile for the data elements required to identify an organization that is identified as a GDUFA Facility.

resource.name: GDUFARegistrantOrganization
resource.description: A specialization of the RegistrantOrganization profile that fixes the type to GDUFARegistrant.

resource.name: IdentifiedEstablishment
resource.description: A profile for an identified establishment.

resource.name: IdentifiedEstablishmentRegistrant
resource.description: A profile for an identified establishment registrant.

resource.name: IdentifiedGDUFAFacility
resource.description: A profile for an identified GDUFA facility.

resource.name: IdentifiedGDUFARegistrant
resource.description: A profile for an identified GDUFA facility registrant.

resource.name: IdentifiedLabeler
resource.description: A profile for an identified labeler.

resource.name: IdentifiedOrganization
resource.description: A profile on Organization that specifies a name and an identifier used to identify rather than specify the organization.

resource.name: ImporterAffiliation
resource.description: A profile that associates an organization to its import organization.

resource.name: ImporterOrganization
resource.description: A profile for the data elements required for an organization fulfilling the role of an importer for another organization.

resource.name: LabelerBusinessOperation
resource.description: A profile that associates a Labeler to the set of business operations that it can perform.

resource.name: LabelerCodeRequestBundle
resource.description: A profile that represents the Bundle that contains all of the resources for a Labeler NDC Code Request.

resource.name: LabelerCodeRequestMessage
resource.description: An example of a message header for a Labeler Code Request

resource.name: LabelerInactivationBundle
resource.description: A profile that represents the Bundle that contains all of the resources for a Labeler Inactivation.

resource.name: LabelerInactivationMessage
resource.description: A profile for the Labeler Inactivation Message.

resource.name: LabelerOrganization
resource.description: A profile for the data elements required to identify a NDC Labeler organization.

resource.name: OrganizationBundle
resource.description: A profile that provides the minimum set of information about a Bundle using for Organization messages.

resource.name: OrganizationMessage
resource.description: An abstract profile that indicates what type of request is being made.

resource.name: OutOfBusinessBundle
resource.description: A profile that represents the Bundle that contains all of the resources for an Out of Business Notifcation.

resource.name: OutOfBusinessMessage
resource.description: A profile of an Establishment Registration message

resource.name: ProductSubmissionDocument
resource.description: A profile that represents a document that is required for Product Submission to the FDA.

resource.name: RegistrantOrganization
resource.description: A profile for the data elements required to identify an organization that registers organizations and facilities.

resource.name: SPLAddress
resource.description: SPL-specific Constraints on the Address datatype dealing with US addresses.

resource.name: SPLContactPoint
resource.description: SPL-specific Constraints on the ContactPoint dealing with proper formatting

resource.name: SPLDocumentReference
resource.description: A profile that represents the SPL document that was either created by or was the source for the Organization FHIR Bundle.

resource.name: USAgentAffiliation
resource.description: A profile that associates an organization to its US Agent.

resource.name: USAgentOrganization
resource.description: A profile for the data elements required for an organization fulfilling the role of a US Agent for another organization.

resource.name: SPLDocumentDate
resource.description: Adding a SPL creation date to the document reference.

resource.name: SectionEffectiveTime
resource.description: Providing an effective time for a section.

resource.name: SectionIdentifier
resource.description: Providing an identifier for a section.

resource.name: VersionNumber
resource.description: Adding a version number to documents.

resource.name: BusinessOperationQualifiers
resource.description: Codes that give further information about an organization's business operation.

resource.name: EstablishmentBusinessOperations
resource.description: The set of business operations that can be specified for an establishment.

resource.name: GDUFAFacilityBusinessOperationQualifiers
resource.description: Codes that give further information about a GUDFA facility's business operation.

resource.name: GDUFAFacilityBusinessOperations
resource.description: The set of business operations that can be specified for a GDUFA facility.

resource.name: GenericFacilityMessageTypes
resource.description: The set of message types that are allowed as a Generic User Fee Facility submission.

resource.name: LabelerBusinessOperations
resource.description: The set of business operations that can be specified for a labelling facility.

resource.name: OrganizationSubmissionMessageTypes
resource.description: The set of message types that are allowed as a FHIR organization submission.

resource.name: RegistrantOrganizationTypes
resource.description: Codes that are specifically used for Registration Organizations.

resource.name: SPL Document Codes
resource.description: Document Codes for SPL Product Submission documents

resource.name: SPL Section Codes
resource.description: Section Codes for SPL Product Submission documents

resource.name: TopLevelOrganizationTypes
resource.description: Codes that identify organizations that are considered top-level

resource.name: FHIRSpecificSPLMessageTypes
resource.description: Codes that are unique to the FHIR organization submissions, i.e. these are not current SPL submission types.

resource.name: OrganizationAffiliationCodes
resource.description: Codes that identify the relationship between two organizations.

resource.name: OrganizationTypes
resource.description: Codes that identify the types of organizations involved in a SPL submission.

resource.name: FDA Establishment Registration Logical Model
resource.description: FDA Establishment Registration Logical Model

resource.name: ExampleEstablishment
resource.description: An example of an Establishment Organization.

resource.name: ExampleEstablishmentAffiliation
resource.description: An example of an affiliation between a registrant and an establishment.

resource.name: ExampleEstablishmentFHIRtoSPLProvenance
resource.description: A Provenance record that associates a set of FHIR Registrant and Establishment Organizations with a generated SPL document.

resource.name: ExampleEstablishmentOperation
resource.description: An example of a Establishment's business operations.

resource.name: ExampleEstablishmentRegistrant
resource.description: An example of a Registrant Organization.

resource.name: ExampleEstablishmentRegistration
resource.description: An example of a Bundle containing a set of Establishment Registration resources to register.

resource.name: ExampleEstablishmentSPLtoFHIRProvenance
resource.description: A Provenance record that associates a set of FHIR Registrant and Establishment Organizations with a submitted SPL document.

resource.name: ExampleGDUFAFacility
resource.description: An example of an GDUFA Facility Organization.

resource.name: ExampleGDUFAFacilityAffiliation
resource.description: An example of an affiliation between a registrant and a GDUFA facility.

resource.name: ExampleGDUFAFacilityIdentification
resource.description: An example of a Bundle containing a set of GDUFA Facility resources to identify.

resource.name: ExampleGDUFAFacilityInactivation
resource.description: An example of a Bundle containing a set of GDUFA Facility resources to inactivate.

resource.name: ExampleGDUFAFacilityOperation
resource.description: An example of a GDUFA Facility's business operations.

resource.name: ExampleGDUFARegistrant
resource.description: An example of a Registrant Organization.

resource.name: ExampleImporter
resource.description: An example of an Importer Organization.

resource.name: ExampleImporterAffiliation
resource.description: An example of the linkage between an Establishment and an Importer

resource.name: ExampleLabelerFHIRtoSPLProvenance
resource.description: A Provenance record that associates a set of FHIR Labeler Organizations with a generated SPL document.

resource.name: ExampleLabelerSPLtoFHIRProvenance
resource.description: A Provenance record that associates a set of FHIR Labeler Organizations with a submitted SPL document.

resource.name: ExampleSPLDocumentReference
resource.description: An example of an SPL document that will be attached to a FHIR Provenance.

resource.name: GDUFA Facility Identification Logical Model
resource.description: GDUFA Facility Identification Logical Model

resource.description: A sample Labeler organizaiton that just has the DUNS number and name.

resource.description: FDA Product Submission Document Logical Model

resource.name: ProvenanceActivitySearchParameter
resource.description: A search parameter to allow searching for Provenance records by activity type.

resource.description: An example of a message header for an Out of Business notification

resource.name: SampleEstablishmentInactivationBundle
resource.description: An example of a Bundle containing a set of Establishment resources to inactivate.

resource.name: SampleEstablishmentInactivationMessage
resource.description: An example of a message header for a Establishment Inactivation

resource.name: SampleEstablishmentRegistrationMessage
resource.description: An example of an Establishment Registration message

resource.description: An example of a GDUFA Facility Identification message

resource.name: SampleGDUFAFacilityInactivationMessage
resource.description: An example of a GDUFA Facility Identification message

resource.description: A sample Establishment organizaiton that just has the DUNS number and name.

resource.name: SampleIdentifiedEstablishmentRegistrant
resource.description: A sample Establishment Registrant organization that just has the DUNS number and name.

resource.name: SampleIdentifiedGDUFAFacility
resource.description: An example of an Identified GDUFA Facility Organization.

resource.name: SampleIdentifiedGDUFARegistrant
resource.description: An example of a Identified Registrant Organization.

resource.name: SampleLabelerBusinessOperation
resource.description: An example of a Labeler's business operations.

resource.name: SampleLabelerCodeRequestBundle
resource.description: An example of a Bundle containing a Labeler Code Request resource to register.

resource.name: SampleLabelerCodeRequestMessage
resource.description: An example of a message header for a Labeler Code Request

resource.name: SampleLabelerInactivationBundle
resource.description: An example of a Bundle containing a Labeler Code Request resource to inactivate.

resource.description: An example of a Labeler Organization.

resource.description: An example of a US Agent Organization.

resource.description: An example of the linkage between a Labeler and a US Agent
